posts.title: Will the blond people disappear?
posts.content: The current intense migratory flow between countries promotes the fusion of races and cultures. Of this laudable mestizaje, the blondes who are worst off. Anthropologists estimate that the golden hair are doomed to disappear. The explanation lies in genetics: black hair gene is dominant, while the blond is recessive. Thus, in a mixed couple where one member is blond and the other dark, children predominate with black hair. Proof of this dominance is that in the last 30 years has halved the proportion of blondes in the Nordic countries. In fact, it is estimated that within 200 years, will be born in Finland, the last blond.

posts.title: Curiosities of the Blue Whale
posts.content: The heart of a blue whale is the size of a Mini Cooper, and the heart of an adult whale can weigh about 900 kilos. Just beats once every ten seconds and can be heard from three miles away. An agile person could crawl through the main arteries.

posts.title: Did you know that ...?
posts.content: 1. In the oceans there is enough gold to go around two pounds every inhabitant of the planet. 2. 95% of matter in the universe is invisible. 3. People blink over 10,000 times a day. 4. Humans share more than half of our genes with slugs. 5. The temperature on Earth increases slightly during the full moon.
